attributes.additional_details:
The self employed of are the backbone of the economy. We pay our taxes and NI contributions. When ill or injured we suffer hardship. With reduced work we need better support. We in could only support any government that improves our position.
PETITION
That the government consults with the CBI and the FSB to establish a fair basis to extend sickness and unemployment and other benefits to the self employed who regularly pay their taxes and NI contributions .
